title: Steven Gerrard makes bullish prediction for Manchester United v Liverpool
text:
Steven Gerrard has delivered his prediction for Manchester United v Liverpool (Picture: Getty)

Steven Gerrard is adamant his former club Liverpool will maintain their perfect Premier League record by beating struggling rivals Manchester United at Old Trafford.

Jurgen Klopp’s side have emerged as the early frontrunners in the Premier League title race, winning eight straight fixtures to move eight points clear of defending champions Manchester City.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s Manchester United, meanwhile, have slipped to 12th in the table having won just once since the opening day of the season.

The Red Devils boast a strong record against Liverpool but Reds legend and Rangers boss Gerrard is feeling confident ahead of Sunday’s much-anticipated clash.

Steven Gerrard's verdict on Man Utd v Liverpool Q: Is this the perfect time for Liverpool to face Manchester United? A: Yes. Q: What’s going to happen? A: Liverpool win. Q: What makes you so confident? A: Liverpool have played eight and won eight. The front three are in fantastic form, they’re not conceding many goals, they’re European champions. Do you want any more reasons why Liverpool are going to beat Manchester United?! Did you think I was going to say anything different?

Manchester United manager Solskjaer is under huge pressure at Old Trafford but insisted on Friday morning that his team is improving.

‘I have never felt the job is too big for me,’ he said. ‘I am confident in the staff.

‘The improvement is there to see for us. It is about results, winning games, scoring goals.

‘We have not taken enough risks. The top teams take more risks than we do. It is not safety that does it here.’
